divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my boyfriend were at the beach , just the sky , the sea the orizon , it was a beautiful day , we were kissing on the beach and suddenly i felt that someone watching us , also M. He felt headache ....i watching the sea with the tale of the eye and there was this oval light glowing, around 6ft large , i walked to see what was it , and suddenly this thing get fast towards the horizon visible, we heard strange sound noise like radio distortion like a whistle. I thinked it was an allucination and for joke i said, ok if you are E.t send me some message and at the horizon 3 beams of light out of the water pointing the sky , moves from left to right going underwater and again other 3 from right to left , each beam of light seemed to rotate on itself. And all 3 lights seemed to rotate togheter . Ater that we was stunned shocked, i cried . I never trust about et co i g to the world , just think like scientists do, after this sighting i trust in the ancient astronauts theory and for many years , the number 33 haunts me . Actually in 2013 i had another sightning near my home in Puglia south Italy and i filmed it !
